member.name: IShellMenuCallback.CallbackSM
member.summary: Receives messages from a menu band object.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that contains information about the menu.
A message ID. This will be one of the SMC_XXX values. See Shell Messages and Notifications for a complete list.
A WPARAM value that contains additional information. See the specific SMC_XXX message reference for details.
An LPARAM value that contains additional information. See the specific SMC_XXX message reference for details.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellMenuCallback
member.summary: A callback interface that exposes a method that receives messages from a menu band.
